name: Danganronpa: Double or Nothing Prologue
description:
Danganronpa is a Danganronpa/YTTD fangame made by C.A. (Cal_A_Arts) and a small group of talented voice actors. 

The story follows the Ultimate Criminal Mastermind, Harper Oleander, as he navigates his way through a casino-based killing game. 

This download only contains the prologue, which includes character introductions and the first 'trial.'

Voice actors, music, and plugin credits can be found in the credits section. 

Here is a link to the projects instagram account

:)

Enjoy!
